div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre:
1427 Asia Minor, southern, before 1938 Burial: late 4th-3rd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: "some" AR Aspendus: double-sigloi (as SNGvonA. 4573-8) ANS 1944.100.50795 ANS 1967.152.481 ANS 1967.152.478 ANS 1967.152.480 ANS 1967.152.479
Disposition: New York 6 Raymond, Coin Topics 9 (1938), p. 6
